title: Gold Steadies After Sharp Drop Sparked by Wider Market Jitters
description: Gold steadied after a sharp decline sparked by a wider selloff across financial markets that may have been amplified by algorithmic trading.
content: Gold steadied after a sharp decline sparked by a wider selloff across financial markets that may have been amplified by algorithmic trading.
